data.message: Slim Motherfuckin' Shady! Come on man! We can't wait for your next album any more! Music sucks nowadays and we need some new shit. SSLP 2 would be crazy!

replies.message: Mìke Tìpple, Slim Shady made a song called "Under the influence" and it starts like this: "So you can suck my dick if you don't like, my shit , 'Cause I was high when I wrote this so suck, my dick, ha ha!"

He also made a nice little tune called Just don't give a fuck

And still don't give a fuck

👊
There could only be one SSLP, a second one would ruin the originality of the first, my opinion tho
Keep going dude! you're on your way!
I still think the same about the mmlp2 ^
Just listen to "Medicine man", I mean hes really close to real Slim Shady and feel like he gotta stand up! No matter what is gonna be called.
I know I listen to that tune every other day, it's a nice tune, I been listening to his albums since a good 17, 18 years now, you can't make a second sslp mate lol.

Music today is shit? Go listen to untitled, to pimp a butterfly by Kendrick. Statik Kxng by crooked I and Statik skeleta. Human. by Joel Ortiz. The documentary 2/2.5 by the game. Compton by dr Dre. Love Story by yelawolf. Phyme by Royce da 5'9 and DJ premier. There's plenty of dope music out.
